longBusinessSummary: Newpath Resources Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral resource properties in Canada. It primarily explores for gold and lithium deposits. The company has an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Orefield project that includes 2,177 contiguous claims covering an area of approximately 67,448 hectares located in northwestern Ontario. It also owns 100% interests in 11 contiguous claims covering an area of 233.963 hectares situated in Schreiber Area of Thunder Bay Mining Division, Ontario; and in the Northshore Gold property located in the Schreiber-Hemlo Greenstone Belt. The company was formerly known as Ready Set Gold Corp. Newpath Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
